SEL Structures and Routines in the Classroom

Setting Up Your SEL Classroom

Read an excerpt from Everyday SEL about how to set up your SEL-informed classroom. The chapter introduces SEL artifacts such as POP Charts and Classroom Agreements to help positively impact your classroom's climate and culture. Think about how these tools can be applied in your space with the students that you work with and what modifications you might make. 

As you're reading, use this SEL Implementation Plan as a guide to capture your favorite SEL strategies to help students get energized and/or relaxed throughout the school day. Favorite practices can be added to your POP Chart, or intentionally inserted into your classroom schedule during transitions between lessons, activities, or classes.
